DOC.brief_title: Study Effectiveness Liraglutide Added High Dose Insulin Type II Diabetics
DOC.detailed_description: 40 subject Type 2 diabetes use > 100 unit insulin per day without metformin HbA1c > 6.5 % randomize 2 treatment group : treatment group liraglutide add insulin control group insulin uptitration 6 month . Primary endpoint compare group HbA1c 6 month . Secondary endpoint include weight , total daily insulin dose , percent time euglycemic , hyperglycemic , hypoglycemic range continuous glucose monitor ( CGM ) , effect GlycoMark hs-CRP . Safety endpoint include incidence hypoglycemia incidence gastrointestinal side effect .
